transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji Shri Krishna and company mein baat ho rahi hai na sir?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir.
Executive: Main Vishal baat kar raha hun sir IndiaMART se sir. Aapka concern aa rakha hai uske liye maine connect kiya hai sir. To main fir wohi puch raha tha sir fir kya hai aage bataiye aap mujhe.
Customer: Samajh nahi aa rahi kya bol rahe ho?
Executive: Aapka IndiaMART pe concern aaya hua tha na 24 discontinue karne ke liye.
Customer: Dusre dusre number pe baat karo.
Executive: Main actually na us pe kar raha hun us pe incoming call nahi ja rahi sir.
Customer: Aap na number note karo fir waha pe baat karna.
Executive: Kaunsa wala number hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Main keh raha tha aap fir mujhe unka dusra number de dijiye.
Customer: Haan 9855.
Executive: 9855.
Customer: 556.
Executive: Six.
Customer: 728701.
Executive: 7287 801.
Customer: 801.
Executive: Haan ji. Main ek baar number repeat kar raha hun sir. 9855 672801.
Customer: Haan ji theek hai is pe baat kar lunga.
Executive: Inka number hai ye?
Customer: Ye jo incoming nahi aa rahi na unka number hai. Dusra number hai na.
Executive: Vanshika?
Customer: Nahi nahi par.
Executive: Vanshika hai na? Gurvinder ji hai inka naam?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay. To ye aap handle karti hai woh handle karti hai sir?
Customer: Woh handle karte hai na isliye unka number diya tha.
Executive: Woh handle karti hai?
Customer: Haan ji woh handle karti hai. Owner aap hai?
Customer: Nahi owner hum dono hi hai. Baap beta.
Executive: Owner aap dono hi hai. Theek hai. Actual mein woh sir keh rahe the band karne ke liye but recently unhone IndiaMART continue kiya tha. To isliye main connect kar raha tha sir.
Customer: Unse hi baat unse hi karna.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to talk on another number.

Resolution:

- Executive took another number from the customer.

Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will talk to executive.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- discontinue, incoming calls, indiaMART, number
